channel.title: [614] pk4fun [614]
channel.description:
This is Pk4Fun 614! DONE Started Not started (soon more)
Bank: good working banking Bank Tabs Npc: Npc drops Npc talking Npc stats, emotes, hp, level, more Npc Yelling, saying object stuff: doors (not like real rs) Ladders altars Add Map object 4 Jan 11:56:26 Remove map object 4 Jan 11:59:43 skills: Crafting Combat skills Prayer bones burn Runecrafting WoodCutting Agility 3 Jan 07:12:48 Cooking Mining And the other stuff is not started i can make click skills but i go try to add the most i know Pvp: player attacking, die Pvp rewards, drops commands: Staff commands, Player commands Make some items unspawnable 3 Jan 07:15:28 and thats the most important shops: shops If thats done: if thats done i go work on minigames. and more stuff.
some picts ([img]dint work): A logo: http://img827.imageshack.us/i/pk4funlogo.png/ Home: http://img232.imageshack.us/f/welcomescreen.gif/ Pvp: http://img840.imageshack.us/f/fullpvp.png/ Npc combat: http://img401.imageshack.us/f/npccombat.jpg/ Commands: http://img820.imageshack.us/f/command.png/ Mining: http://img46.imageshack.us/f/mining.gif/ npc talk: http://img251.imageshack.us/f/npctalk.jpg/ but its still have a glich... like this: btw this is a vid to show 100% npc combat (need to add npc emote att, block, death, fire only need to know ids) & npc talk proof [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0c1rBiPFjGM]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0c1rBiPFjGM[/url] <-- already putted in server help Credits: RuneExtream Basic

item.title: [614] pk4fun [614]
item.dc:creator: @_Pandemonium `Pandemonium
item.description:
@_Pandemonium wrote:

[quote=“loled2, post:5, topic:375949”]THANKS ALL!

btw All been released?[/quote]

Everything you’ve done here has either been released with a base, released in a tutorial, or released as a snippet. This is why I think you should start doing your own stuff past that of changing the home and adding commands. Posting stuff that came with the base is rude to the original developer.

Read full topic
